file_content.text: We've arrived at the space station. From here, we can get transport to Voss. Let's figure out what we're doing.
Voss? Whoever heard of such a place? You are going crazy!
I can't believe you think you can chase us away with some mythical healing ritual.
You think you're the puppeteer, but you're just the puppet.
We need to find a way to silence these ghosts.
[Ignore ghosts.] Let's go.
Surely you can find more productive things to do than annoy me?
This is getting out of hand.
I'll get you out of my skull even if it means splitting it open and grabbing you myself.
Shut up!
Sounds like things are getting worse up there. Hope we find this cure soon.
You've been strong, but until you control these ghosts, they are of no use to you.
I've been studying Darth Vilus's journals.
It seems Vilus also found himself with unwanted tenants and came here to Voss for a cure.
I will follow in his footsteps, and hope it bears fruit.
Let's hope that's useful.
Let's hope you have better luck. Vilus succumbed to the ghosts in his mind and went completely mad.
What was he after? Some kind of ritual?
Any description of the cure?
So it would appear.
The sooner I can get these guys to shut up, the better.
Whatever stops the voices!
It won't be easy. Vilus failed and went insane.
Voss is a recent and strange discovery--a utopia built around a group of Force users called Mystics.
The Mystics aren't Sith or Jedi, though--for them, the Force is a conduit of healing and sometimes, visions. Rituals that manipulate the Force are rare and often forbidden.
It means the cure I'm looking for is likely also forbidden.
This presents a problem.
If we're to believe Vilus's writings, yes.
Doubtless one of the Mystic visions led to this ritual being... stop!
I wonder what the Voss are so afraid of.
Forbidden, hmm?
They follow the visions of their Mystics in all things. And they look to protect their society. The rituals were just too dangerous.
Unfortunately, the ritual to repair your fractured mind is one of the forbidden... stop!
Tell me about these visions.
Visions?
My understanding is that they are infrequent but powerful glimpses of the future that provide guidance to Voss society.
But the ritual that will heal your mind is forbidden. The Voss... stop!
At last. Relentless parasite. I am myself again.
Was wondering when you'd show up again.
Zash mentioned a contact on Voss. I guess I'll start there.
Let's get started.
Perfect. Andronikos, did Zash leave any indication of where we should start?
Bad timing, monster.
After I'm healed, you're next, Khem. I promise.
Good to see you, buddy.
I eagerly await the day.
Notes say to talk to someone called Athelis Kallis. Supposed to be researching the Voss. Guess we should start there.
